level.heading: Agreements with other states.
level.text: An officer of the District that has the authority to place children and an official of a private agency licensed as a child placement agency by the District government pursuant to subchapter I of this chapter, is authorized to enter into an agreement with the appropriate officer or agency in another party state pursuant to subsection (b) of Article V of the compact.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-30, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 4-1421.
